attributes.action: Not backdate the increase in Air Passenger duty for travellers who have already booked their flights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Air Passenger Duty is due to rise on 1 Feb 2007. It has been announced that Gordon Brown wants it to be backdated and to affect those who have already booked their travel (and fly after 1 Feb 07).

This could mean upto an extra £80 per person which is unacceptable. Some companies plan to absorb the costs but others are insisting that this is paid by the traveller (and if not paid then you cannot travel).
